fields.name: Agriculture, employment (number of people) (ILO World Employment and Social Outlook (2016))
fields.description: Number of people employed in agriculture. Employment comprises all persons of working age who during a specified brief period, such as one week or one day, were in the following categories: a) paid employment (whether at work or with a job but not at work); or b) self-employment (whether at work or with an enterprise but not at work)
